description: Combine hydrogen and oxygen to make water
Combine carbon and oxygen to make carbon dioxide
Melt sand at high temperature to make glass
Alloy iron and carbon to make steel
Alloy copper and tin to make bronze
Alloy copper and zinc to make brass
Fire limestone and clay to make cement
Cover copper wire with insulation to make wire
Make circuit board with plastic and copper
Make valve with steel and rubber
Pass current through iron to make magnet
Coat glass with silver to make mirror
Make transistor with silicon and gold
Make resistor with carbon and ceramic
Make capacitor with aluminum and plastic
Make LED with silicon and gallium
Make hammer with iron and wood
Make saw with steel and wood
Make drill with steel and motor
Make screwdriver with steel and plastic
Make knife with steel and wood
Make axe with steel and wood
Make shovel with steel and wood
Make pickaxe with steel and wood
Combine electronic components to make radio
Combine many electronic components to make computer
Make ship with large amounts of steel and motor
Make book with paper and leather
Make canvas with fabric and wood
Make paint with coal and oil
Make painting with canvas and paint
Make cheese with milk and salt
Move magnet and wire to generate electricity
